two convolutional layers with 32 ﬁlter maps followed by pooling, then another convolutional
layer with 16 feature maps and pooling. The fully connected layer that interprets the features
is increased to 100 nodes and the model is ﬁt for 70 epochs with a batch size of 16 samples.
The updated build model() function that deﬁnes and ﬁts the model on the training dataset is
listed below.
